description: A simple dashboard showcasing service status updates over time tracked by the Uptime Kuma monitoring tool.

panels.description: This Panel lists Services that are in inactive state
panels.title: Unhealthy Services

panels.description: This Panel lists Services that are in pending state
panels.title: Pending Services

panels.description: This Panel lists Services that are currently under Maintenance
panels.title: Services in Maintenance

panels.description: This panel shows all http services and the remaining days after the certificate needs to be renewed
panels.title: Certificate Validity Days

panels.description: This Panel lists Services that are in inactive state
panels.title: Unhealthy Services

panels.title: Pending Services

panels.description: This Panel lists Services that are currently under Maintenance
panels.title: Services in Maintenance

panels.description: This panel shows the different $monitor_types based services and their response times in the selected interval as well as their mean- and minimum response time.
panels.title: Response Times of all $monitor_types - Based Services

title: Uptime-Kuma Status
